title: Bug 4329 - No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: Expect to see search results when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Right-click on a package. 
3. Select the 'Search' option from the context menu. 
4. In the search dialog, enter a keyword for declarations. 
5. Click the 'Search' button. 
6. Observe that no search results are displayed. 

Note: Searching via the context menu in the packages view works as expected. The search functionality should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, it should display the element name and not the fully qualified name.
